text: Ezɨ kɨ ghaze, nɨ faragh bizir kam gifuegh mɨkɨmɨva an amamangatɨghan koghtɨma, kɨ bizir kam damuan kogham. Kamaghɨn ami, Onesimus na ko ikiasa, kɨ a mɨgeir puvatɨ. Ezɨ bizir tizim nɨ a damuasa, kɨ mɨghɨghvɨra nɨ gakaghoran aghua. Kɨ nɨghnɨsi, nɨ arazir aghuim nan akurvaghsɨ na damu, kamaghɨn nɨ uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangɨva a damu.
